summary: The story of the Disney Renaissance, an incredibly prolific, successful and prestigious decade lasting from 1984 to 1994 that saw the fallen Walt Disney Animation Studios' unexpected progressive triumphant return to excellence.
cast: Don Hahn|Ron Clements|Peter Schneider|Roy Edward Disney|Rob Minkoff|Glen Keane|Michael Eisner|Jeffrey Katzenberg|Mike Gabriel|Roger Allers|David Pruiksma|Gary Trousdale|George Scribner|John Musker|Thomas Schumacher|Mark Kimball|Kirk Wise|Dick Cook|Lisa Keene|Roger Rose|Corey Burton|Howard Ashman|Don Bluth|Tim Burton|Randy Cartwright|Andreas Deja|Walt Disney|Christopher Emerson|Elton John|John Lasseter|Alan Menken|Dennis Cosmo Michael|Tim Rice|Henry Selick|Steven Spielberg|Laurin Sydney|Sherri Sylvester|Richard Williams|Robin Williams|Robert Zemeckis
title: Despertando a la bella durmiente
